pages.md:
## Lenses Without Aperture Rings

Users of lenses with no aperture ring can rotate the command dial past minimum aperture to select **A** (auto), then press the center of the dial to cycle to **S.S. (PROGRAM SHIFT)** and use program shift to choose other combinations of shutter speed and aperture that will produce the same exposure.

## Previewing Depth of Field

When **PREVIEW DEPTH OF FIELD** is assigned to a function button, pressing the button displays a !Preview Depth of Field Icon icon and stops aperture down to the selected setting, allowing depth of field to be previewed in the display (ðŸ“– 253).

!Depth of Field Display
